caption.p: Percentages of different terpene classes in studied Satureja EOs from leaves, herba, calyx, and corolla. ( a) S. montana subsp. montana from the mountain region; ( b) S. montana subsp. montana from the coastal region; ( c) S. kitaibelii; ( d) S. subspicata subsp. liburnica; ( e) S. subspicata subsp. subspicata; : Monoterpene hydrocarbons; : Oxygenated monoterpenes; : Sesquiterpene hydrocarbons; : Oxygenated sesquiterpenes; : Other aliphatic and aromatic hydrocarbons; L: Leaf; H: Herba; K: Calyx; C: Corolla.
